verses.plain: Wherefore, holy brethren, partakers of the heavenly calling, consider the Apostle and High Priest of our profession, Christ Jesus;

tokens.t: Wherefore, holy brethren, partakers of the heavenly calling, consider the Apostle and High Priest of our profession, Christ Jesus;

verses.plain: Who was faithful to him that appointed him, as also Moses was faithful in all his house.

tokens.t: Who was faithful to him that appointed him, as also Moses
in all his house.

verses.plain: For this man was counted worthy of more glory than Moses, inasmuch as he who hath builded the house hath more honour than the house.

tokens.t: For this
was counted worthy of more glory than Moses, inasmuch as he who hath builded the house hath more honour than the house.

verses.plain: For every house is builded by some man; but he that built all things is God.

tokens.t: For every house is builded by some
; but he that built all things
God.

verses.plain: And Moses verily was faithful in all his house, as a servant, for a testimony of those things which were to be spoken after;

tokens.t: And Moses verily
faithful in all his house, as a servant, for a testimony of those things which were to be spoken after;

verses.plain: But Christ as a son over his own house; whose house are we, if we hold fast the confidence and the rejoicing of the hope firm unto the end.

tokens.t: But Christ as a son over his own house; whose house are we, if we hold fast the confidence and the rejoicing of the hope firm unto the end.

verses.plain: Wherefore (as the Holy Ghost saith, To day if ye will hear his voice,

tokens.t: Wherefore (as the Holy Ghost saith, To day if ye will hear his voice,

verses.plain: Harden not your hearts, as in the provocation, in the day of temptation in the wilderness:

tokens.t: Harden not your hearts, as in the provocation, in the day of temptation in the wilderness:

verses.plain: When your fathers tempted me, proved me, and saw my works forty years.

tokens.t: When your fathers tempted me, proved me, and saw my works forty years.

verses.plain: Wherefore I was grieved with that generation, and said, They do alway err in their heart; and they have not known my ways.

tokens.t: Wherefore I was grieved with that generation, and said, They do alway err in
heart; and they have not known my ways.

verses.plain: So I sware in my wrath, They shall not enter into my rest.)

tokens.t: So I sware in my wrath, They shall not enter into my rest.)

verses.plain: Take heed, brethren, lest there be in any of you an evil heart of unbelief, in departing from the living God.

tokens.t: Take heed, brethren, lest there be in any of you an evil heart of unbelief, in departing from the living God.

verses.plain: But exhort one another daily, while it is called To day; lest any of you be hardened through the deceitfulness of sin.

tokens.t: But exhort one another daily, while it is called To day; lest any of you be hardened through the deceitfulness of sin.

verses.plain: For we are made partakers of Christ, if we hold the beginning of our confidence stedfast unto the end;

tokens.t: For we are made partakers of Christ, if we hold the beginning of our confidence stedfast unto the end;

verses.plain: While it is said, To day if ye will hear his voice, harden not your hearts, as in the provocation.

tokens.t: While it is said, To day if ye will hear his voice, harden not your hearts, as in the provocation.

verses.plain: For some, when they had heard, did provoke: howbeit not all that came out of Egypt by Moses.

tokens.t: For some, when they had heard, did provoke: howbeit not all that came out of Egypt by Moses.

verses.plain: But with whom was he grieved forty years? was it not with them that had sinned, whose carcases fell in the wilderness?

tokens.t: But with whom was he grieved forty years?
not with them that had sinned, whose carcases fell in the wilderness?

verses.plain: And to whom sware he that they should not enter into his rest, but to them that believed not?

tokens.t: And to whom sware he that they should not enter into his rest, but to them that believed not?

verses.plain: So we see that they could not enter in because of unbelief.

tokens.t: So we see that they could not enter in because of unbelief.
